CustomField.description: Checked if opportunity should not receive Commissionable Dollars ACV accelerator uplift (xactly attainment and commissions)
CustomField.formula: IF(OR( AND(CloseDate >= DATE(2020,08,02),CloseDate<=DATE(2022,01,29),CONTAINS( Owner_Role_Copy__c , "Renewal")), AND(CloseDate < DATE(2020,11,01), OR (CONTAINS( Owner_Role_Copy__c, "Industrial"),CONTAINS( Owner_Role_Copy__c, "IND"))), ACV_Bookings_SOT__c <=0), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: ACV Uplift Ineligible
